preReview.title: Hurzeler drawing on Toure advice as Brighton chase Europe
preReview.description: Fabian Hurzeler welcomed legendary midfielder Yaya Toure to Brighton's training ground this week, before their clash with Newcastle United.

funFacts.fallback: Danny Welbeck has the least touches (27) of any outfield player.
